text: Chris Hayes is a Canadian skydiver. Hayes is noted for having won the bronze medal in speed canopy piloting at the first Canopy Piloting World Parachuting Championships in Vienna, Austria in 2006. == References == == External links == * Canadian Sport Parachuting Association - Web page describing Hayes' medal at the Canopy Piloting World Parachuting Championships. title: Chris Hayes (skydiver)
